post0.title: Open a GitHub Blog in 10 minutes (part 1)
post0.content: Go to the fastpages GitHub repository, click setup instructions | Click ‚Äòon this link‚Äô | Create a repository | . | Wait until the ‚ÄòPull Request‚Äô is done in your repository . | Click Initial setup and follow the directions. Generate SSH key-pair: RSA, 4096 Click to generate secret and deploy keys | Copy ‚ÄòPrivate Key‚Äô and paste it to the secret key (Name: SSH_DEPLOY_KEY) | Copy the ‚ÄòPublic Key‚Äô and paste it to the deploy key. | . | Click Merge pull request below Initial setup description . | After 2 minutes or so, you can see your blog address at your repository‚Äôs README.md |

post1.title: PHP & Apache Initial Setup on macOS
post1.content: Start PHP on macOS . macOS has PHP and apache (apachectl) installed by default. However, if you look at the httpd.conf file, it says PHP has been removed from macOS 12 version. ‚ÄúPHP was deprecated in macOS 11 and removed from macOS 12‚Äù (/etc/apache2/httpd.conf) Therefore, we need some prep work to run PHP and apache servers on Mac. . PHP installation brew install php@8.0 . | httpd(apache) installation brew install httpd . | Modifying the httpd.conf file file find command $find ‚ÄòFind Path‚Äô ‚ÄòFormat‚Äô ‚Äú‚ÄòFile Name‚Äô.extension‚Äù find / -name "httpd.conf" . | Go to the folder where httpd is installed cd /opt/homebrew/etc/httpd . | Open the httpd.conf file as admin (enter the password) sudo vi httpd.conf . | Modify httpd.conf Line 53 -> Change to Listen 80 | Line 182 -> Uncomment LoadModule rewrite_module lib/httpd/modules/mod_rewrite.so | Add LoadModule php_module /opt/homebrew/opt/php@8.0/lib/httpd/modules/libphp.so to the bottom line (path installed in brew install php) | Line 195 -> Change User Username | Line 196 -> Change to Group staff | Line 217 -> Change to ServerAdmin localhost | Line 250 -> Change to DocumentRoot "Project Path" | Line 251 -> Change to <Directory "Project Path"> | Line 271 -> Change to Allow Override All | add to the bottom line bash AddType application/x-httpd-php .html .php AddType application/x-httpd-php-source .phps PHPIniDir /etc | Save (:wq) | . | . | Modify php.ini file find php.ini file find / -name "php.ini" . | Go to the folder where the php.ini file is located cd /opt/homebrew/etc/php . | Modify the pip.ini file Line 198 -> Change short_open_tag = On | . | . | Execute Apache Server Check the service list brew services list . | httpd server startup brew services start httpd . | . | Connect to localhost . | To stop httpd server brew services stop httpd . |
